comment._content: Is it just me or is his head way to big for his body?

comment._content: That's what I thought as soon as I saw the picture too.

comment.author: 33890245@N07
comment._content:
I thought the same thing too! He probably had a hard time dodging punches with a head that big...

On a serious note, there was a professional boxer named Jimmy Devine that lived around that time. I wonder if this was his brother.
